website_summaries.verdict: As one of the biggest Chromebooks, the Acer laptop is perfectly priced for anyone interested in a big laptop for basic online use.
pros: The Acer Chromebook 15 is a stylish notebook with a large 15.6-inch screen
It has a backlit keyboard, touchscreen and loud speakers
cons: Chromebooks have inherent OS limitations you need to be aware of

customer_reviews.title: Died after six weeks
customer_reviews.text: Died after six weeks. Would not buy again. Repair was not an option. 25% of buyers reported the same problem. If I had noticed high report of problems, I never would have purchased in the first place, despite glowing review on CNet. Returned for credit, but only got 80% of purchase price ($300 or $379) since it quit after 30 day warranty. Their warranty repair was messy and I didn't want to repair what was a lemon to start out with. Now I don't know what new chromebook I will buy next. I am still using my old HP. It won't be an ACER, that's for sure!
customer_reviews.author: MomEAG

customer_reviews.title: Best Chromebook I have owned.. and I have owned many.
customer_reviews.text: I really like my Acer Chromebook 15 touch CB515. It weighs less than most 12" Chromebooks at only 3.1 Lbs. and has a very long battery life of 12 hours per charge. The brushed aluminium case is very nice and strong. Very clear and bright 15.6" IPS multi-touch display, which is just the right size for my poor vision. Good feel to the back-lit keyboard. Runs Google Drive/Docs/Sheets/ Slides offline and it runs Android Apps. Cons: This unit does not work with the Oculus Rift VR headset.
customer_reviews.author: SelmaTeacher7 - Daniel Berry

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy if you need something reliable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Chromebook for college, and not even a week in the screen started acting up. Randomly, and with no fix, the screen will start flickering near the bottom. Sometimes the entire screen will cut to black with green lines on it. The disappointing thing is that I love the Chromebook so much, I just need the screen to work! And Amazon is out of stock and can’t replace it. One of my classes is online, so that’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Chrome book is junk. Security or not
customer_reviews.text: The Chromebook will not allow me to use any expensive recording equipment that I have previously purchased. Does not work with fruity loops, does not work with line 6 software, will cost me $100 for tech-support to get my printer working with the chrome book. I cannot upload any music to the chrome book with a flash drive. The touch screen worked fine for exactly one day. Then everything I wanted to click on with my finger required 5 to 10 touches per button, Every time! If you want to waste money and get frustrated at the same time, this is the laptop for you
customer_reviews.author: Ken Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Thanks Acer
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Chromebook! The backlit keyboard, speakers and hd screen are all great. No issues at all. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: organicdav

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Cons: -The screen flickers/turns black when I move it up/down. -Videos (Netflix/Youtube) sometimes play at half speed without sound, and the only fix is a hard reboot. -The power button does not always work. It is a hassle to turn on the laptop every time, I try to keep it on all day. -It crashes a lot. Just turns itself off. -Trackpad clicks loudly when pressed (some people might like that) -Speakers have made loud buzzing noises and distorted audio, fixed by a hard reboot. Pros: -Battery lasts 10-12 hours as advertised -large high resolution touchscreen that works almost as well as a smartphone touchscreen -USB-C charger on both sides -relatively cheap
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: Screen is bigger than I thought HD quality brilliant picture. Can't believe some of these reviews there is nothing not to like about this Chromebook. I first plugged it it to charge it and on standby I don't use it much only at home it lasted 3 days before I had to charge it. I've had it like 2 weeks only charged it twice. Sound is awesome with 2 speakers on the side of the keyboard. Only drawback is if you have to carry it a lot is pretty heavy that's the only bad thing I can find absolutely love love love this Chromebook not my first but the best for price.
customer_reviews.author: sloberl

customer_reviews.title: Not touch screen from what I can tell? Great laptop alternative
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this laptop. I've had crappy laptops my whole life ($100 - $300) and I finally got fed up and decided I wanted something that actually worked for classes and work. This thing is amazing, quick and beautiful. As I was working on it, my brother was so impressed he went online and ordered one for himself. **Keep in mind, we used to really bad laptops** Totally worth it, it's even good for some light Steam gaming. You do have to do some coding to get Steam to run on it though. There are tutorials online, but most games have worked pretty well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey T.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: First time using a non-windows OS. Also a first using a laptop instead of a desktop. So far I love everything this does. Very simple operating system with work capabilities. Large screen, almost to big. Touchpad is excellent and not jittery at all. No need for a mouse. Using it home and great to go from room to room with. I should have bought this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Qdogs

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Trackpad
customer_reviews.text: I bought for the good specs. However, the trackpad/touchpad was soo bad I had to return immediately. After doing some googling in attempt to fix it before shipping it back, I read that Acer has touchpad issues across the board. My mom's last chromebook was also Acer and a piece of garbage, so staying away in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Molls

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Laptop was fine for a little over a year, was used very little however. The other day though it would not turn on. I tried everything i read online and nothing worked. I reached out to Acer customer support and since it is out of warranty (by 3 months) I would have to pay $365 to have it repaired. That costs more than just replacing it with a brand new one. Stear clear from this laptop and look for a better company than Acer. They obviously dont stand behind their product. A laptop should not fail after 1 year of light use.
customer_reviews.author: David Lee

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful screen. These things are a great bargain
customer_reviews.text: So light and so fast. Beautiful screen. These things are a great bargain!
customer_reviews.author: Finx

customer_reviews.title: Read this before you buy
customer_reviews.text: For $300 this is probably the best laptop you can get. It is really light, looks really good, touch screen, big screen. But the build of the computer is not great(for $300 it’s good) the keys and the back of the computer feels like they are made out of cardboard I had to get a case for it because it’s really easy to leave scratch and marks. And it is good for reading email and some general office work but nothing beyond that. if you are looking in to buying it I would recommend buying a case with it. It felt way better after the case was installed.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Chang

customer_reviews.title: Not good.
customer_reviews.text: Too many glitches, crashes, one them fatal. Not sure if it's Acer or Google, my laptop is a literally a boat anchor In under one year. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Robbins

customer_reviews.title: I'm getting rid of it. I can't figure it out.
customer_reviews.text: Works fine, but not typical laptop. I have a hard time figuring out how to find things like zip archive!! Impossible! And the instruct. manual is basic, nothing is explained at length. And Google chrome?? It's like sell your soul in a silver case, a huge advertising sell your privacy in a box. You can't easily use it with a private browser or other outside apps, it errors out. Developers could probably figure it out. I'm getting rid of it
customer_reviews.author: RebelLemming

customer_reviews.title: Speakers Rock
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a laptop/chromebook that had two upgrades from my now 4 year old chromebook. All I use it for is web searching and reading articles, etc.. Back lit keyboard is fantastic. The speakers are on top so the sound is no longer muffled and is an incredible upgrade in volume. Touchscreen works fine when I decide to use it. Much easier to clean than a matted screen. Battery life is fine as advertised. Somebody had mentioned in a review about sharp edges on the bottom and they are correct. I would think you could possibly nick yourself if not careful. Overall I really like this chromebook.
customer_reviews.author: umpstu

customer_reviews.title: Poor qaulity product
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 of these devices for our children. Both have been in for repair multiple times, both were related to screen malfunctions. These have been the worst computer devices I've ever purchased, and unfortunately, I bought 2 of them.
customer_reviews.author: R. McCabe

customer_reviews.title: Repair City
customer_reviews.text: I've sent this in for multiple repairs under warranty. First for rebooting issues. (The system kept restarting). It came back with damage and the screws on the bottom missing! After two days, the rebooting issues came back. So I sent it back the second time for repair. Well I just got it back today and... Now the keyboard is acting up! Can't type. I think I got a lemon. Sending it in for the third repair with a request for replacement. When it does work, it's awesome. But you should definitely stay away. I'll update this as things keep going.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Cordaro

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with the computer
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. It was a gift and it does everything she needs it to do for school. Very happy with the product so far
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Woolfolk

customer_reviews.title: Did not work out of the box
customer_reviews.text: It was DOA from the start. The screen never turned on, just completely black even though the keyboard backlight was on. Initially I thought the battery was not charged, so I charged it for a few hours. Same result. Bad quality control from Acer. This was my first and my last Acer product. Brand is not reliable. I am returning it and looking for a better brand. It was cheap for a reason, it does not work.
customer_reviews.author: nuwestm

customer_reviews.title: Dead On Arrival
customer_reviews.text: Screen is DOA and the machine looked as if it may have been refurbished, when it was purchased new. Seller is BESTDEAL TECH.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Useless. I would not recommend buying this even if you're on a budget. Screen blacks out, and when watching movies, sometimes screen would freeze and sound would repeat on loop. Does not support Skype video calls well without freezing. No CD/DVD slots. I kinda regret this purchase tbh.
customer_reviews.author: Ayace Malice

customer_reviews.title: Did not work 2 hours after unboxing. Pile of garbage ACER product
customer_reviews.text: I recieved the computer in 3 days instead of the 2 like I should have with amazon prime. I unboxed the computer, charged it for 2 hours, then tried turning it on. The screen did not work. The keyboard lit up but not the screen. I then contacted ACER support for an hour and did numerous troubleshooting tests and everytime the computer would not turn on. I wasted over $300 and will now me missing many school assignments because of the computer that does not work. It is a pile of junk and I nor the many people I tell about this will never be buying another ACER product because of there terrible products and quality.
customer_reviews.author: shauna geiger

customer_reviews.title: Nice Chromebook Computer
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking Chromebook computer, bigger screen display than most Chromebooks, reasonably fast processor, responsive keyboard, nice screen display, sound is a bit tinny but ok (often use bluetooth speaker for music anyway). Love the ease of use of Chromebooks, have owned several over the years. Files in the "Cloud" such as Google Photos, GMail, or Google Drive are readily accessible from wherever you are via computer or cell phone. If you already have a Gmail account it's quick and simple to initialize a new Chromebook computer, takes only a couple of minutes.
customer_reviews.author: George Mosby

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Experience
customer_reviews.text: I have had the Chromebook for a few months now. I have been running into constant issues. First, I keep getting the ram issue while viewing web pages and it constantly crashes. Chrome crashes all the time for various other reasons. Chrome never crashes on my windows based pcs. The apps in the play store rarely work. The apps seem to only work on phones and always seem to have issues running on the chrome book. I tried playing a simple game like hearthstone but it takes so long too process the game, its unplayable. Hearthstone works just fine on the phone. I wish I never purchased this PC.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Fast Laptop
customer_reviews.text: I decided to buy a chromebook because my past two pc laptops have been absolutely useless for the same price. This chromebook starts up in seconds (literally) and is very fast when web browsing. The battery life is fairly good as it lasts roughly up to 11 hours. Love the backlit keyboard, HDMI port, and type c charhing port. The only con i have about this laptop is that it runs on the chrome os of course. I've used windows my whole life so adjusting to chrome is a little rough, but manageable. Overall this was one of my favorite buys and am currently typing this review now on the ACER.
customer_reviews.author: Seda L.

customer_reviews.title: Very expensive for a paper weight, which is basically all this is.
customer_reviews.text: Useless. Infuriating. Clunky. These are some of the words I'd use to describe my feelings about this laptop. Within the first couple of months, it stopped turning on. Because it was still under a one year warranty, Acer "fixed it" after determining that there was a hardware issue. Now, after having it back for about a month, it will no longer stay connected to WiFi, which apparently is likely another hardware issue. I bought this laptop because the reviews were overall positive and it seemed like a good deal. It's given me nothing but trouble and I will now have to send it back to Acer for a second time.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Punkosdy

customer_reviews.title: Top notch Chromebook!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with my purchase. It starts up instantly does everything I need it to do. It doesn't matter how many tabs I have open, no matter what I have going in the background, the Acer never misses a step. The screen is beautiful and the upward stereo speakers crank! I am an Acer customer from here on out.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Screens don't work.
customer_reviews.text: After buying TWO of these over a period of a month, I can tell you that you are lucky if the screen comes on when you get it. BOTH...yes, BOTH I got had bad screens what wouldn't come on. What are the odds of that? Seriously...run the six sigma math on the chance of getting two out of two with bad screens, it's astronomical. Me thinks they just plain suck as a model...and I've had many great Acer Chromebooks.
customer_reviews.author: AKR

customer_reviews.title: Works fine, but has some basic problems
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about 3 months now, and the sound has stopped working 4-5 times (solved by closing the chromebook and opening it back up), and 4-5 times the screen has randomly gone black and closed all open apps (comes back on a few seconds later). I think these are kind of minor issues, since I can still use it perfectly fine the majority of the time, but a similarly priced tablet or a refurbished full laptop might be a better option.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Achilles hinge
customer_reviews.text: 10 months of use. First experience with Chromebook. Performs just fine for general web surfing and printing. Still adjusting to no CAPS lock. Only thing that has become an issue is the hinge. It is still intact but, there is some snap, crackle and popping when opening/closing. Not sure how much longer it will hold up but, hinge aside, really happy with this Chomebook.
customer_reviews.author: MaryJo

customer_reviews.title: but I like it very much
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little getting used to after always having windows, but I like it very much. I use a wireless mouse instead of the built in. Find it easier to use. The touch screen and backlit keyboard are excellent features.
customer_reviews.author: John Kimmins

customer_reviews.title: Spine came unglued
customer_reviews.text: Had to return product because the spine split, Amazon, as always, was most gracious about the issue. While I love Chrome Books and this one was very good, the spine ran all the way across the back when raising screen whereas my other Chrome Books have two hinges on the back for lifting screen. If not for this issue really liked product.
customer_reviews.author: rob decleene

customer_reviews.title: only reasonI gave 4 stars because I ordered so far ordered 4 from Best Buy, one of them was bad - didn’t ...
customer_reviews.text: Runs well , intel pentium processor, touch screen, very fast, only reasonI gave 4 stars because I ordered so far ordered 4 from Best Buy, one of them was bad - didn’t start . Two I bought from amazon , one of them again was bad- it showed power, and I will hear starting sound but blank screen, return was prompt . I ordered another one, it was good . Seems like this model has some issues in the some units. If you didn’t receive the bad lot, it works like a charm/ robust with all features and fast!
customer_reviews.author: Medicine2

customer_reviews.title: ACER provides NO customer service.
customer_reviews.text: When we received this product, the screen would not turn on. Flyer inside the box said to call ACER support and not to return the product if there was a problem. Well, it would have been nice if ACER had someone to answer their phones. I know it is virus time and perhaps fewer people are working, but they should state that on their hold message. I tried calling 3 times, each time waiting for over an hour until I gave up. Needless to say, product is going back and I am buying a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Sander de Wildt

customer_reviews.title: Great chrome book
customer_reviews.text: I can not say enough, I wanted to move away from Windows as I find I have nothing but trouble and most of my work is web based I went with the chrome book. I do like it a lot I plan to get another mine was reconditioned but looked like new no obvious wear. It did arrive with the wrong charger but the correct one was sent out no big deal. If you want to close the window on windows and mostly do surfing and web bases activity give it a go I did buy a 128 gig micro card to store info on the machine
customer_reviews.author: kevin cupples

customer_reviews.title: Loved this computer but had problems
customer_reviews.text: It's difficult for me to rate this computer because I loved it. It had the nice large screen and a backlit keyboard. I sadly returned it because the touch screen didn't work. I had already returned another one that locked up and I had to let the battery run down to get it to turn off. I would buy another one in a heartbeat if I could be assured that there would not be problems with it. Maybe I just got two lemons but I'm leary of trying again.
customer_reviews.author: Аmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like this chromebook
customer_reviews.text: Some of the buttons have fallen off and I am unable to put them back on. I am afraid of how much the repair will cost for the buttons to be fixed. I really like the wide screen. Navigating through the laptop took some getting use to. I really like the touch screen when it comes to playing certain games.
customer_reviews.author: Quincy

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Love this chromebook! Love the size and speed is great, I can have a million tabs and chrome extensions going on and it doesn't slow down
customer_reviews.author: CBabinet

customer_reviews.title: Love the Touch Screen!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Chromebook at an affordable price. I have enjoyed the 15" display, which is great for web design and watching movies too. I love having the touch screen. That's my favorite feature. It is a little large to sit comfortably in my lap, but that's the trade-off for the big beautiful display. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: MadKate

customer_reviews.title: Nice Chromebook with Short Longevity
customer_reviews.text: This was a nice chromebook with many nice features. Unfortunately it only lasted slightly more than a year before the hinge broke free from the top and cracked the screen. The screen is directly connected to the hinge by a screw, and when the hinge broke from the plastic, the screen flexed and cracked.
customer_reviews.author: Hughez

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy From This Company, Do Not Buy This Computer
customer_reviews.text: This computer never worked out of the box. The screen does not work and only shows black. I was directed to work directly with Acer. They have been terrible to work with. Three times they have not followed through with the promise to repair. Acer was supposed to send a box for shipping to repair. That never happend. Now that the warranty is up there is nothing that can be done. Bottom line = TERRIBLE PRODUCT, TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great and super functional laptop
customer_reviews.text: Got this today, setup took no time at all, connected to everything right away. Light weight, nice size screen, easy to connect USB mouse and touch pad works well. Also used the Citrix Chrome plug in to remotely access work desktop, flawlessly pulled it off. Will test it on some trips shortly, but so far very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: OK Quality
customer_reviews.text: I picked 3 stars cause the machine features where terrific. Touchscreen was great.Speed was great.Ease of use was great. These machines are made on assy lines and things happen unfortunately I got one with a short in the machine and it kept logging me out and shutting down. Beside while I did use it,it worked awesome.
customer_reviews.author: theoilgod

customer_reviews.title: Crashes
customer_reviews.text: Brand new. I hardly use it and it crashes on its own at least 1x any time I use it. I did a hardware reset and it helps but not what you should have to deal with when you spend good money on what is supposed to be a good product. When it works, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Stunning Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 5 different Chromebooks over the last couple of years, this is THE best one by far. Other reveiws have pointed out all the positives: HD screen, backlit keyboard, speakers and the list goes on/on. Absolutely love this Chromebook and likely to purchase a second one!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M. Godsil

customer_reviews.title: Screen did not work
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this item because the screen did not turn on when the Chromebook was first powered up. Tried increasing brightness but that did not work. I tried holding the refresh button and power button for 10 seconds, something that was suggested as part of my search for a solution, to perform a hard reset but that did not work either. I called support and was place on hold for more than 30 minutes before I finally hung up.
customer_reviews.author: MuggleCox

customer_reviews.title: This is the Best Chromebook for me
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with my Acer Chromebook with Intel Processor and Full 1080P HD video! Great features and very strong battery life. I love Google Chrome and the full integration it provides with my Smart phone and tablet. Having my files in the cloud and the ability to download to the devise when needed has been outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like it!  Good price.
customer_reviews.text: I like the price but there are compability issues with Windows software. For example external device drives not compatible. Hard to get used to keyboard functions if you’re used to A machine running on Windows.
customer_reviews.author: reader12

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a Very Good Laptop!
customer_reviews.text: Keep in mind that I am a Baby Boomer with no 9 or 10 year-olds living with me! I am not computer savvy and my needs are simply for email, web-browsing and playing some games. My Acer Chromebook and I are still getting to know each other and the speed of that process is not to be blamed on the computer!!! I like the computer's screen clarity and speed. I hope to do more exploring after the holiday season and improve my skill set.
customer_reviews.author: Joan C

customer_reviews.title: This has been a great Chromebook. We love the large touch screen
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great Chromebook. We love the large touch screen. The processor can handle anything that is thrown at it. Highly recommended if you are looking for a larger screen with touch-screen functionality. I also own the Asus C302 Flip with the Core M3 processor. The performance difference is negligible.
customer_reviews.author: Mariana Behrens

customer_reviews.title: should have listened to the reviews...
customer_reviews.text: Got this on the Black Friday sale, and as soon as I set it up, I knew something was wrong. The screen will only show for maximum 2 seconds and then it goes black. It just continues to do this and I couldn't get past the first screen. Returning and not even asking for a replacement from this seller. Don't waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina R Brown

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Amazing laptop. I purchased an HP for my mother and the battery was defective and would not charge. I did not want another battery all I wanted to do was exchange the laptop. However I purchased this for my mother instead and she thinks it’s amazing. She says it’s the best laptop she’s ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonJunkie

customer_reviews.title: Received a Used/Returned Computer
customer_reviews.text: Got the Chromebook and immediately noticed the seal was broken. Opened the PC only to find dings and scratches on the aluminum shell and the power cords for the PC obviously had been used and re-stuffed into the box. This one really needed to be marketed as "re-stock", "re-furbished" or "Floor Model". I do not have the time to return for a new one and for our business use the functionality is fine, but was not happy with the condition as it was sold as new.
customer_reviews.author: Villages C.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Horrible HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: The touchscreen did not work since the day I bought it and the second and third time I used it the computer screen went black but the keyboard was still it up. The screen has not worked since, I have only had the laptop for about two weeks. I tried to contact the seller and there’s no number. I sent them an email and still have not received a reply as to replacing it or refunding me. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!! TRUST THE REVIEWS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was ok while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: It ran fast enough for my basic needs on it. The main issue was that the touch screen stopped working after the 1st week and I never bothered to get another one after that. Kind of cheap feeling in that respect to breaking so quickly. The other issue I had was that there was no way that I saw to put folders on the basic desktop area to put all of you most used programs into for easy and quick sorting.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin  Masterson

customer_reviews.title: Great little Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: Nice big HD screen. Backlit keyboard is handy. Battery life is tremendous. Key touch is good. Can use Google apps from Playstore. Is prone to freeze requiring a restart when too much is going on at once. Reasonable sound from dual speakers either side of keyboard. This is my 3rd Acer Chromebook so something must be right!
customer_reviews.author: David F.

customer_reviews.title: worst purchase i have ever made
customer_reviews.text: ordered this computer and the touch screen did no work. sent it back and they gave me another, same problem. i sent it back to get fixed at this point i was beyond annoyed. well a week later they did not fix the computer and now im done trying to make things right. 3 attempts later with the same issue over and over again, biggest waste of time.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Bye bye windows!
customer_reviews.text: Have had this for a while now and it has been flawless. Instant start up, great screen resolution, fast page response and very inexpensive. USB type C charging for easy plug in.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Vogt

customer_reviews.title: Bar raising Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: 15.6 inch display, backlit keyboard, touch screen, sd slot, excellent video, super sound. Definitely raises the bar for Chromebooks
customer_reviews.author: Jim and Marie Iverson

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend this computer.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would give this computer a try because it was reasonably priced. VERY DISAPOINTED! Worked fine for a while. Now its so slow and sometimes the sound doesnt work. The battery doesnt last very long either. It also freezes up.I would not recommend this computer.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Chromebooks are the bomb, I liked the first one so much I bought another one. I especially like this Chromebook because it has a touch screen and a lit keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: R. S.

customer_reviews.title: WiFi issues from day 1
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this laptop less than one year now. The WiFi goes out all the time and I’ve powerwashed the laptop and nothing has fixed it. It’s under warranty and needs to have a new air card installed. Otherwise it’s completely useless. Help!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally, found everything in one.
customer_reviews.text: I've had several computers, tablets and etc. but this baby has it all. Speed, virus free, quality screen resolution, touch screen, and a backlit keyboard. The only thing I really miss is the numbers to right, but I'll get over it. Don't hesitate when thinking of getting this. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: poppy24

customer_reviews.title: Great for the high schooler
customer_reviews.text: Intended use was for my high schooler to have a laptop for her daily use on classwork and homework. Fits the bill and no complaints other than her OCD regarding fingerprints.
customer_reviews.author: J. Koo

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this chrome book. We purchased early 2019 and it has had to be sent out for repair twice for shutting or powering off all the time. All the Google apps you know and love come standard on every Chromebook, which means you can edit, download, and convert Microsoft Office files in Google Docs, Sheets and Slides
With the Google Play Store, you can access a rich library of apps, games, music, movies, TV, books, magazines, and more, all from your Chromebook
Chromebooks come with built-in storage for offline access to your most important files and an additional 100GB of Google Drive space to ensure that all of your files are backed up automatically
